body_html:
Here it is:

classifier = learn.TensorFlowEstimator(model_fn=tanh_dnn, n_classes=len(categories) + 1,
    steps=len(documents) * 10, learning_rate=0.2, batch_size=100)

classifier.fit(X_train, y_train)
classifier.save('categories.model/')

Since it was renamed from skflow to learn - I haven't tested the different path types other than the one you see there, which still causes the checkpoint file to have a full path.

body:
Here it is:

```
classifier = learn.TensorFlowEstimator(model_fn=tanh_dnn, n_classes=len(categories) + 1,
    steps=len(documents) * 10, learning_rate=0.2, batch_size=100)

classifier.fit(X_train, y_train)
classifier.save('categories.model/')
```

Since it was renamed from `skflow` to `learn` - I haven't tested the different path types other than the one you see there, which still causes the checkpoint file to have a full path.
